backend/main.mo: Main canister logic defining notes, profiles, share links, authorization checks, and CRUD-style operations backed by in‑canister maps and shared mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module adding a new shareLinks map to existing actor state by transforming old saved data into the updated structure.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components used, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend files including components, hooks, styling, and routing.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file bootstrapping the React application and mounting the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app configuring routing, authentication flow, layouts, secure share-view routes, and initial UI states.
frontend/src/components/DataOwnershipTer: Page component presenting data ownership, privacy, and voice-data handling terms with Cyber‑Tech styled sections.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying encryption messaging and branding in a themed layout.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenEditor: Full-screen note editor with creation/editing, speech-to-text, animations, and self-destruct settings.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling authentication, user menu, and navigation links with Internet Identity integration.
frontend/src/components/LockAnimation.ts: Animated lock loading screen cycling through image frames.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Login screen encouraging users to authenticate via Internet Identity with feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/NewNoteOverlay.t: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/NoteEditor.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/NotepadPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/NotesApp.tsx: Main notes dashboard managing search, note selection, editor overlay, and voice greeting logic.
frontend/src/components/NotesList.tsx: Scrollable notes list with self-destruct countdowns and selection handling.
frontend/src/components/OurStory.tsx: Static informational page describing CypherSafe’s mission and background.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Renders a profile setup form where users enter their name and saves it via a mutation. Includes UI elements, validation, and loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/QuickGuide.tsx: Displays a multi-section guide explaining core app features with icons and navigation back to the notes page. Provides static instructional text grouped by topics like authentication and saving notes.
frontend/src/components/ScanningAnimatio: Shows a full‑screen animated scanning overlay that fades out shortly after mount. Uses simple state timing to control visibility and transitions.
frontend/src/components/SecureNoteViewPa: Fetches an encrypted shared note, extracts a key from the URL, decrypts it client‑side, and displays the result or error states. Handles view-once, expired, and invalid link scenarios with dedicated messaging.
frontend/src/components/Settings.tsx: Provides a settings page with navigation, user profile loading, and a toggle to mute or enable the AI voice greeting. Also includes a link to data ownership terms and responsive UI elements.
Generates encrypted share links for notes using client-side encryption, supports view‑once or timed expiry, and copies the resulting URL to clipboard. Manages UI state for link generation, copying, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Displays a timed splash screen with a logo and fade‑out zoom animation before calling a completion callback. Uses simple timers to control transition timing.
frontend/src/components/VaultLocked.tsx: Shows a full‑screen lock screen prompting the user to authenticate via Internet Identity. Includes loading states and animated visuals indicating the vault is locked.
frontend/src/components/WelcomePopup.tsx: Displays a welcome dialog that marks the popup as seen and closes after confirmation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, stored identity loading, and auth client setup via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, note operations, greeting preferences, and welcome popup state using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceGreeting.ts: Plays a chime and time-based spoken greeting once per session using the Web Speech API unless muted.
frontend/src/index.css: Establishes global styles and a cyber-tech theme using Tailwind, custom fonts, OKLCH colors, and neon/glass utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClientProvider, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/shareCrypto.ts: Implements AES-GCM encryption/decryption utilities for secure note sharing using Web Crypto API.
frontend/src/utils/shareLink.ts: Builds a full share URL by combining the app origin, shareId path, and encoded key in the hash fragment.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash/query-based routing params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend theme.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing secure note‑sharing features, architecture notes, and existing feature definitions.
